title: State of Texas Flag Lanyard 2-Pack Waterproof Zip Card Ship Pass ID Holder Mens Womens Kids Adult Detachable Breakaway Snap Buckle (2-Pack Cruise)
features: [ 2-PACK ] Two of these cruise ship lanyards are included, which is of the same design. At the end of your cruise, you can remove the waterproof ID holder and attach to your keys and itâ€™s now a keychain lanyard.

[ WATERPROOF ID HOLDER ] Attached to the lanyard is a waterproof ID holder that is perfect to put your ship pass card inside of in addition to other items like your ID and money. At the top of the waterproof ID holder is a zip closure, to ensure the inside contents stay water free.

[ DETACHABLE ] Each lanyard contains a snap buckle release. Image wearing your lanyard and you want to give someone the waterproof ID holder. Instead of removing the entire lanyard from around your neck, just pull off the waterproof ID holder via the snap buckle release.

[ DOUBLE SIDED PRINT ] Our colorful designs are printed on both sides of the lanyard, which is made of 100% polyester. The snap buckle release is made of plastic. The waterproof ID holder is made of PVC plastic.
[ EXCLUSIVE DESIGNS ] This cruise ship lanyard design is exclusive to Desert Cactus.
description: Our cruise lanyard line is perfect to show your fun while on your cruise. Each of our packs of cruise lanyards includes two total of the same design. Attached to the lanyard is a waterproof ID holder with a zip closure, which helps keep the inside contents dry and safe. These lanyards are perfect to place around your neck and put your cruise ship pass, ID and money inside of. [ SEWING ] The way the lanyard is sewed is in order to ensure you can wear the lanyard around your neck and it will show the design property. It may appear as it was sewn backwards but that was done on purpose.
